title: AI Software Market Forecast to Hit $62.5 Billion in 2022
sub_head: Many enterprises are boosting spending on AI as they seek better processes to develop applications
body:
Wunderman Thompson plans to increase its artificial-intelligence spending next year, and the New York-based marketing agency isnâ€™t alone.
The AI software market is expected to hit $62.5 billion in 2022, a 21.3% increase from this year, according to a Gartner Inc. report released last week, as enterprises boost their AI spending.
